solution_line_template: The papers in the envelope weigh {total_paper_weight} + {envelope_weight} = {total_weight_fraction} = <<{total_paper_weight}+{envelope_weight}={total_weight_simplified}>>{total_weight_simplified} ounces.
Thus, Jessica needs {total_weight_simplified} * {stamps_per_ounce} = <<{total_weight_simplified}*{stamps_per_ounce}={stamps_needed}>>{stamps_needed} stamps to mail her letter.
